title: Honey, We Shrunk the Us in Grounded
description:
This week, we're playing Obsidian's miniaturized survival sim Grounded, and mostly talking about stripping Rick Moranis of his science license. Also, ROCK AND STONE! By which we mean: We're also talking about Deep Rock Galactic, now that we've all actually played it!

Also discussed: Binding of Isaac, RogueJack, Mars First Logistics, Near Dark, Q: The Winged Serpent
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
